FROM THE MANUFACTURER

TAKE ON ANY CHALLENGE

Always ready for action, the TUF Gaming A15 excels at gaming, streaming, and everything in between. Up to AMD Ryzen 5000-H Series CPU to fly through multitasking and more. Gameplay graphics are smooth with the latest GeForce RTX 30-Series GPU which reliably delivers high frame rates for a ton of modern games. A superfast NVMe PCIe SSD speeds up load times, while an open SSD slot makes it easy to add terabytes more space for all your games.

SPEED TO VICTORY

Game at pro-speed with a fast, IPS-level panel up to 240Hz (optional). With Adaptive-Sync, the display's refresh rate synchronizes with the GPU's frame rate to reduce lag, minimize stuttering, and eliminate visual tearing for ultra-smooth and immersive gameplay.

STUN WITH STYLE

A textured honeycomb design on the base adds grip and echoes the hexagon reinforcements around the chassis. formidable Optional Up to 90Wh battery combine to offer up to 14.7 hours of video playback, Fast and reliable Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax)

LASTING COOL

Four heat pipes and three heatsinks draw heat away from your hardware and dissipate it quickly, keeping component temperatures at optimum levels. A self-cleaning cooling design ensures that your cooling system stays debris-free for full functionality for the long haul.

CRYSTAL CLEAR AUDIO

Two speakers with four cut-outs are loud and powerful, enabling deeper audio immersion. DTS:X Ultra delivers high-fidelity audio for clear, precise sound. Virtual 7.1-channel surround sound enhances spatial awareness in-game to help you get the drop on enemies

OPTIMIZED FOR GAMING

Uniform RGB backlighting lets you express your own unique style, while highlighted WASD accents give you a visual shortcut to key movement commands. each key is durable enough to withstand over 20 million presses for superb long-term reliability and precision

VERSATILE AND UPGRADEABLE

An easy-upgrade design makes sizing up your RAM and SSD a breeze. All you need is a screwdriver to access memory slots and storage bays, while a special pop-open nut lifts one side of the panel

XBOX GAME PASS

Access to over 100 high-quality PC games on Windows 10 with new games added all the time. One-month subscription to Xbox Game Pass that’s included with the purchase of your device.

*Active subscription required; continues until cancelled; game catalog varies over time. Requires Windows 10 and an app to play PC games; see details at xbox.com/pcgamesplan.

Top Reviews from India

Pradeep Kumar Rebavarrapu
LOW CPU USAGE, LOW CPU POWER DRAW ISSUE
I Recieved this asus tuf a15 ( ryzen 7 4800h and rtx 3050, 8gb ram ) on 22nd September and started checking if everything is ok.

After testing (Running Benchmark, checking cpu and gpu work load and fps during gaming, Screen test, speaker test, etc) for 4 days continuously, Everything Seems to be working alright but i faced one problem.

Problem was sometimes cpu doesn't seem to be working 100% means Even in heavy load cpu usage and its clock speed was very low. Cpu usage was around 50% and even cpu was drawing less power. I Think its because of software as to control thermals but even in cool environment (23°C) I faced this issue.

Due to less cpu usage and low clock speed, i was getting low benchmark.

So, I concluded that may be 8gb ram is becoming bottleneck for my laptop.

Then, Today on 1 oct , 2022, I upgraded my laptop ram to 16 gb ( G skill 3200mhz ddr4 8gb ram) and now i am facing this problem more.

CPU Usage and Cpu power draw reduced more to only 13 watts during gaming ( Valorant ) and Fps count become ( 98 average).During gaming for 30 min, Tdp was set to 13 watts and not increasing a bit and my cpu temperature was locked at 61°C.

After All this,My Conclusion - I think Asus Laptop bios have underclocked Cpu to control the thermals and there is no way to change it normally.

Praneeth karri BEST LAPTOP
This laptop is beast at the price i purchased (68,000). It offer a 8 core processor and rtx 3050 graphics. It can easily run any software be it autocad, or Adobe premiere pro. It also boots up very quickly 10s due to its ssd. It has gen 3 m2 ssd which offers transfer speed upto 2500mbps. The version i purchased came up with free mc afee anti virus for one year
I purchased this laptop on 29 Sept, 2022 and writing this review after 3 months.
Due to less cpu usage and low clock speed, i was getting low benchmark.
Build Quality of this laptop is also very nice . I personally like the chasis design a lot. The heat exhaust vents works perfectly fine and cools the laptop.
If you are getting it at a price less than 72k then you should definitely go for it.
